name: Cabbage Vendor
description: A street merchant selling fresh vegetables; adventurers can buy provisions, hear local gossip, or help with delivery tasks.
atmosphere: The air carries the fresh, earthy scent of vegetables and the subtle tang of soil. The vendor's cart is a riot of green and colorful produce, while the sound of haggling and the rustle of fresh leaves creates a simple, honest atmosphere of daily commerce. The atmosphere is one of community and the simple pleasures of fresh food.
